Package de.wortschatz.hbase

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Cooccurrence
    Class to represent a Cooccurrence between to words with significance and frequency
    CooccurrenceEmigrationManager
    Emigration manager that migrates cooccurrence data from SQL to HBase.
    CooccurrenceKeyGenerator
    Generates the row key for the cooccurrence table
    EmigrationManager
    Abstract class that manages the migration of a SQl database to an HBase table
    HBaseConnector
    Singelton class that provides a connection to an HBase instance
    HBaseCRUDer
    Created by Marcel Kisilowski on 22.01.15.
    PerformanceTests
    Created by Marcel Kisilowski on 24.01.15.
    SentenceEmigrationManager
    Emigration manager that migrates the sentence data from SQL to HBase.
    SourceEmigrationManager
    Emigration manager that migrates the source data from SQL to HBase.
    SqlConnector
    Singelton class that provides a connection to an SQL database instance
    SqlDataGetter
    Get Data from defined MySQL Database and arrange them for HBase Created by wolfo on 15.01.15.
    SqlDataGetterTest  
    WordEmigrationManager
    Emigration manager that migrates the word data from SQL to HBase.
